name: 東方時空書 ~ Touhou Rune Legend
name_original: 東方時空書 ~ Touhou Rune Legend
description:
東方時空書 ~ Touhou Rune Legend is a vertical danmaku typing game in Touhou-style

It is a (half) Touhou fangame made by Chinese studio 喝喝水工作室(HellHoleStudios) 

Please pay attention that the demo version may vary from the release. This version uses test graphics, unpolished textures and contains bugs.

Feature
  • A easy-to-play game to practise/test your typing skill
  • Up to 6 stages with increasing difficulty (3 in demo)
  • 2 Playable characters
  • 4 Different difficulties for first-time typists to (somehow) pros
  • Touhou-style system
  • 2 Languages: Chinese and English
How to play

Download the game. There is a MANUAL.TXT that will do pretty much the teaching.

FAQ

Q: How to run the game?

A: In windows, You need to install Java 8. Double-click the jar file to run. In Linux/MacOS, install openjdk-8-jre then open console in the game folder and type java -jar <jarname> to run. The game is tested on Windows10 64bit and Ubuntu18

Q: The game crashed after I beat stage 3!

A: That's intended. Congrats on beating the game though!

Q: The graphics are so ugly!

A: This is a demo version. Please ignore that. Sorry though.

Q: The background is not seamless!

A: Please ignore that, please.

Q: How to use bomb? How to type? Who are the characters?

A: 👉MANUAL.TXT

Q: Why no Touhou characters except Reimu?

A: The story and characters are designed by Zhuky.RLG. Ask him.

Q: When will the full version release?

A: It depends. And we may charge symbolically.
